subject: using SecureClassLoader?
msgSnippet: Hi, Does anyone have any experience with security-related problems due to the fact that TestCaseClassLoader extends ClassLoader instead of SecureClassLoader?
messageBody:
Hi,

Does anyone have any experience with security-related problems due to the
fact that TestCaseClassLoader extends ClassLoader instead of
SecureClassLoader?

I've encountered problems being able to accurately grant permissions to test
case code because the (pre-1.2) classloader isn't associating a
ProtectionDomain with the dynamically loaded classes. As a result, you can
only grant permissions with non-specific "grant {};" policy grant entries.

If someone has already implemented SecureClassLoader support, could you
please let me know?

Thank you,

Jim
